description: Gradle plugin that auto-generates REST API documentation (JSON, OpenAPI 3.0, Postman) from Spring Boot @RestController classes using Javadoc-based scanning and reflection
rules: This is a Gradle plugin — use 'restMetaGenerator' DSL block in build.gradle for configuration
Requires Java 17+ and Spring Boot @RestController annotations
Use Javadoc custom tags (@response, @error, @throws, @group, @auth, @header) on controller methods
errorCodeClass and errorResponseClass follow two-tier resolution: DSL override first, then framework default
The execution pipeline runs in order: ErrorCodeScanner → RestApiDocGenerator → ErrorJSON → OpenAPI → SpecBundle → Postman
